fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
- Horizon Europe 
- European Maritime and Fisheries Fund 
- European Regional Development Fund 
- All maritime and RDI related funds 
- Regulation on Market-distorting subsidies, FDI screening, trade etc.
organisation_name: GROUPEMENT DES INDUSTRIES DE CONSTRUCTION ET ACTIVITES NAVALES (GICAN)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Mr William LAPORTE - GICAN C/O SEA EUROPE Rue de la Loi 67
goals__remit: Ce Groupement a pour vocation de défendre les intérêts de ses membres auprès de l’état et des institutions européennes, promouvoir leur savoir-faire à l’international et animer ce réseau de membres. Le GICAN organise également les salons Euronaval et Euromaritime.
relevant_communication:
- Le navire des métiers 
- Salon Euronaval 
- Salon Euromaritime
